questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to the economic recession.'
options: The economic recession caused the company's profits to drop considerably.
Despite the economic recession, the company's profits increased significantly.
The company's profits improved because of the economic recession.
The economic recession had no effect on the company's declining profits.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה המשמעות: המיתון הכלכלי גרם לירידה משמעותית ברווחי החברה. 'Due to' ו-'caused' מבטאים קשר סיבה-תוצאה זהה, ו-'declined significantly' זהה ל-'drop considerably'. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales decreased due to competition' = 'Competition caused sales to decrease'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect: Due to + noun = caused by + noun; declined = dropped

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to increased competition.'
options: Increased competition helped the company's profits grow significantly.
The company's profits rose despite increased competition.
Increased competition caused a significant drop in the company's profits.
The company reduced competition to increase profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 3. 'declined significantly due to' זהה במשמעות ל-'caused a significant drop'. שני הביטויים מתארים ירידה חדה ברווחים כתוצאה מתחרות מוגברת. המשפטים האחרים הופכים את המשמעות או משנים את הקשר הסיבתי. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales fell due to the crisis' = 'The crisis caused sales to fall'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect: 'declined due to' = 'caused a drop/fall in'

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to increased competition.'
options: Increased competition led to a significant decline in the company's profits.
The company's profits increased because of reduced competition.
Despite increased competition, the company's profits remained stable.
The company reduced competition to increase their profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה הסיבתיות - התחרות הגדלה גרמה לירידה ברווחים. המשפט המקורי משתמש ב-'due to' והתשובה הנכונה ב-'led to', שתיהן מבטאות קשר סיבה-תוצאה זהה. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales dropped due to poor weather' = 'Poor weather led to a drop in sales'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause-effect expressions: 'due to' + noun = 'led to' + noun (same causal relationship)

options: Increased competition led to a significant decline in the company's profits.
The company's profits increased because of reduced competition.
Despite increased competition, the company's profits remained stable.
The company reduced competition, which improved their profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה הסיבתיות - התחרות המוגברת גרמה לירידה ברווחים. המשפט המקורי משתמש ב-'due to' והאפשרות הנכונה ב-'led to', שתיהן מבטאות קשר סיבה-תוצאה. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales dropped due to the recession' = 'The recession led to a drop in sales'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect: 'due to' + noun = 'led to' + noun (expressing same causal relationship)

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to increased competition.'
options: Increased competition helped the company's profits grow significantly.
The company's profits rose despite increased competition.
Because of greater competition, the company's profits dropped considerably.
The company reduced competition to increase their profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 3. 'Due to' ו-'because of' מבטאים סיבתיות זהה, ו'declined significantly' זהה ל'dropped considerably'. שני הביטויים מתארים ירידה משמעותית ברווחים בגלל תחרות מוגברת. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales fell due to high prices' = 'Because of high prices, sales dropped'.
questions.grammarRule: Causality expressions: Due to/Because of + noun phrase = same meaning with synonymous verbs (decline/drop)

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to the economic recession.'
options: The economic recession caused the company's profits to drop considerably.
Despite the economic recession, the company's profits increased significantly.
The company's profits improved because of the economic recession.
The economic recession had no effect on the company's declining profits.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה המשמעות: המיתון הכלכלי גרם לירידה משמעותית ברווחי החברה. 'Due to' ו-'caused' מבטאים יחס סיבה ותוצאה זהה, ו-'declined significantly' שווה ל-'drop considerably'. דוגמה דומה: 'Traffic increased due to construction' = 'Construction caused traffic to increase'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect: Due to + noun = caused + object + infinitive

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to increased competition.'
options: Increased competition led to a significant decline in the company's profits.
The company's profits increased because of stronger competition.
Despite increased competition, the company's profits remained stable.
The company reduced competition, which improved their profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה המשמעות: תחרות מוגברת גרמה לירידה משמעותית ברווחי החברה. המשפט המקורי משתמש ב-'due to' ואילו התשובה הנכונה משתמשת ב-'led to', אך שניהם מבטאים קשר סיבה-תוצאה זהה. דוגמה דומה: 'Sales dropped due to poor weather' = 'Poor weather led to a drop in sales'.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect expressions: 'due to' + noun = 'led to' + noun (both express causation)

questions.text: Original: 'The company's profits declined significantly due to increased competition.'
options: Increased competition led to a significant decline in the company's profits.
The company's profits increased because of reduced competition.
Despite increased competition, the company's profits remained stable.
The company reduced competition to increase their profits significantly.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 1. שני המשפטים מבטאים את אותה הסיבתיות: התחרות המוגברת גרמה לירידה ברווחים. המשפט המקורי משתמש ב-'due to' והמשפט הנכון משתמש ב-'led to', שתיהן מבטאות סיבה ותוצאה. שאר האפשרויות משנות את המשמעות או הכיוון הסיבתי.
questions.grammarRule: Cause and effect: 'due to' + noun = 'led to' + noun (same causal relationship)
